metadata.title: CVE-2018-6156 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: Incorect derivation of a packet length in WebRTC in Google Chrome prior to68.0.3440.75 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted video file.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
